meanings.sent1: The delicious cake on the table was very temptable.
meanings.sent2: The shiny jewelry in the store window looked very temptable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel found the picnic basket to be very temptable.
meanings.sent4: The forbidden fruit seemed irresistibly temptable to Eve.
meanings.sent5: The alluring aroma of freshly baked cookies made them highly temptable.

meanings.sent1: The curious child was very temptable by the colorful candies.
meanings.sent2: The lonely traveler felt temptable to explore the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat found the dangling yarn to be very temptable.
meanings.sent4: The fragile resolve of the dieter made them easily temptable by the dessert cart.
meanings.sent5: The vulnerable heart was temptable by sweet words and kind gestures.
